movie.title: Victory at Entebbe
movie.plot: An Air France airplane is hijacked by the PLO due the large number of Israeli and Jewish passengers. We follow the action both with the hostages as they cope with confinement and threatened death, and the Israeli cabinet and military that must try to get them out.
movie.awards: Nominated for 4 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 nomination.

events.title: 102 hostages are freed in Operation Thunderbolt at Entebbe airport
